item.title: There will be no update for January Current Version is 11.1.18 Check out the TUTORIAL SECTION on the menu to show you how to get the most out of your firestick!
For videos on how to how to update, add HD sports, or work your Kodi go to bit.ly/rbfschannel
Updating is optional, but there are always new things being added so like and subscribe at bit.ly/rbfschannel
